arts.ttl: Como vs. Venezia playing for safety
arts.sum: After the 2-2 draw in the reverse fixture, Como and Venezia could draw both league meetings of a season for the first time across Serie A, Serie B and Serie C in the era of three points for a win. Over the last 30 years (since the start of 1995), Como and Venezia have faced each other 12 times in the league across Serie A, Serie B, and Serie C: the head-to-head record of these meetings is equal, with four wins each and four draws.

arts.ttl: Man United transfer news: Red Devils 'send scouts' to watch 19-year-old after Jose Mourinho Raphael Varane claim
arts.sum: Manchester United are reportedly running the rule over 19-year-old Fenerbahce defender Yusuf Akcicek, who has broken into Jose Mourinho's first team this season.
